Demographics.Question: Frequency of Playing
Demographics.HelperText: Please choose how frequently you play games on average.

Demographics.Question: Amount of Playing
Demographics.HelperText: Please choose how long you play per gaming session on average, i.e. how much time you spend gaming when you do play games.

Demographics.Question: Favourite game or game genre
Demographics.HelperText: Please write down 3 examples of games or game genres that you like (you can mix).

Starting.Question: Please indicate the extent to which you agree or disagree with this sentence: 'I want to start the game'
Starting.HelperText: Choose how much you agree with the sentence on a scale from -3 (Disagree Strongly) to +3 (Agree Strongly).

Starting.Question: What makes you want/not want to start?
Starting.HelperText: Write down any reasons you have for wanting to or not wanting to start.

Starting.Question: Any other comments? (Optional)
Starting.HelperText: Here you may write down any additional comments, about anything, that you wish to add. The question is optional.
